code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Registration=_ref=>{let{changeToLogin}=_ref;let[username,setUsername]=useState('');let[password,setPassword]=useState('');const createUser=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const newUser={username:username,password:password};await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/auth/registration/',newUser,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},withCredentials:false}).then(response=>{window.location.href='/authorization/';});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"col-6",onSubmit:createUser,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Registration"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-3 d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",name:"username",placeholder:"Enter Username",required:true,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-3 d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"form-control",name:"password1",placeholder:"Enter Password",required:true,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-3 d-flex flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password Confirmation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"form-control",name:"password2",placeholder:"Confirm Password",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"form-control btn btn-primary",children:"Submit"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mt-4",children:["Already have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success",onClick:()=>changeToLogin('login'),children:"Login"})]})]});};export default Registration;
